resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.

status.name: Resolved

fields.description: Issue to track implementation of addition of dates and intervals.

comments.body: Would it be better if the kernel has predictable return type, not depending on the values?
Good call, I changed the return type to {{timestamp}}
